questions: Is there a pen in the image?
Is there a blanket in the image?
Is the blanket made of fabric?
Is the pen on the right of the blanket?
model_output:
Yes, there is a pen in the image. The pen is prominently displayed in the center of the image.
Yes, there is a blanket in the image. The pen is resting on a textured fabric that resembles a blanket.
Yes, the pen is metallic. The pen has a shiny, metallic finish.
Yes, the blanket is made of fabric. The texture and appearance suggest it is made of a woven material.
No, the pen is not on the right of the blanket. The pen is positioned on top of the blanket.
